Name: Gilgam
Description: Gilgamesh, the legendary king of Uruk, embarks on epic adventures in his quest for wisdom and immortality.
_attributes_per_level_rule: for enemies. 70 points between the attributes, with a max of 16 and min of 4 (jam only), then +5 per lvl (or perk)
_perks_per_level_rule: 1 perk per level, or 2 for powerful enemies. bonus perks if failing to convince someone to join
